::Shadow Wing::

She walked into the computer area where Teletran was.  She saw that 
the whole area was almost completely destroyed. She gave a deep 
sigh,"Well, I guess I should start somewhere."
She took a small light from her hip compartment.  She crawled up 
under the console and looked around.  She saw burnt wires, melted 
cords,charred wire boxes, partially melted fuses, it was a total mess.

She found the main wire and power supply lines.  They were burnt and 
melted in spots.  She looked aroud the room for some spair wiring she 
could use to substitute as the power line. She found a short line 
that would work for a while.  She swapped out the lines and pulled 
the burnt fuses.  She had to go to the engine room to find more 
supplies.  She found the fuses and some more wire that was useable.

She went back up to finish working on Teletran.
